title: John Stamos and Graham Phillips to appear in 'The Little Mermaid Live!'
text:
"The Little Mermaid Live!" cast is coming together.

John Stamos and Graham Phillips will play Chef Louis and Prince Eric, respectively, ABC announced Wednesday.

Stamos is best known for starring as Uncle Jesse in "Full House" and the Netflix reboot, "Fuller House," but he's also worked on Broadway, appearing in "How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying," "The Best Man" and "Cabaret."

Phillips, who has appeared in TV's "The Good Wife" and "Riverdale," also originated the role of Evan in the Broadway show, "13."

"The Wonderful World of Disney presents The Little Mermaid Live!” will air live on ABC Tuesday, Nov. 5, from 8-10 p.m. ET, and will honor the 30th anniversary of the animated film.

Auli’i Cravalho will star as Ariel and Queen Latifah will play Ursula. Rapper Shaggy has signed on to play Sebastian.
